Package model

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Log
  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    this singleton class is for logging to console, as well as to optionally save the log to file

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> history
      the log history
      private static Log instance
      the single instance of this class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private Log()
      initializes the history

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(java.lang.String log)
      adds an entry to the history as well as prints out the entry to the console
      void error​(java.lang.RuntimeException e)
      adds an error entry to the history as well as prints out the stack trace of the exception
      IMPORTANT: this method is used for debugging and logging non fatal exceptions that happen, since these exceptions are not thrown
      static Log get()
      returns the only instance of this class, constructs one if needed

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
